summary: This is an email forwarding an invitation from the FBI Victim Services Division to law firms representing identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein. It announces two briefings for victims scheduled for October 15, 2019, in Miami and October 23, 2019, in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are the subject of the FBI Victim Services Division briefings.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division hosts a briefing for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein in late 2019.
Two formal briefings for victims were scheduled: October 15, 2019, in Miami and October 23, 2019, in New York.
Law firms representing identified victims were contacted via email to facilitate victim participation.
The communication indicates an ongoing federal effort to engage with victims following Epstein's arrest and death.
